Lady Gaga v drami Ridleyja Scotta o umoru Maurizia Guccija
03 Nov 2019, 11:21 by STA

Pevka Lady Gaga je po nastopu v filmu Zvezda je rojena, za katerega je bila nominirana za oskarja, dobila novo filmsko vlogo. Zaigrala bo v drami Ridleyja Scotta o umoru Maurizia Guccija iz slavne italijanske modne družine. Prevzela bo vlogo njegove nekdanje žene Patrizie Reggiani, ki so jo obtožili, da je naročila umor.



Lady Gaga bo v Scottovem filmu igrala vlogo nekdanje žene Maurizia Guccija Patrizie Reggiani. Foto: Profimedia

LOS ANGELES > Maurizzija Guccija je leta 1995, ko je bil vodja družinske modne hiše, pred njegovo pisarno ustrelil plačanec. Dve leti kasneje so Patrizio Reggiani aretirali in jo leto zatem obsodili na 29 let zapora zaradi vloge pri njegovem umoru.
Mediji, ki so budno spremljali sojenje, so jo označili za črno vdovo. Njeni hčeri pa sta trdili, da je na njeno vedenje vplival možganski tumor, v upanju, da bo sodba razveljavljena. Nazadnje so jo leta 2016 izpustili zaradi primernega vedenja, poroča britanski Guardian.
Scott bo zgodbo ekraniziral s pomočjo žene Giannine Scott, ki je najbolj znana po vlogi žene Russella Crowea v Gladiatorju, bila pa je tudi producentka več filmov. Scenarij bo po knjigi Sare Gay Forden The House of Gucci: A Sensational Story of Murder, Madness, Glamour, and Greed napisal režiser Roberto Bentivegna, ki se bo ob tej priložnosti prvič prelevil v scenarista.
Lady Gaga je v priredbi muzikala Zvezda je rojenaBradleyja Cooperja, ki je v njem tudi zaigral, dobila nominacijo za oskarja za najboljšo igralko in osvojila kipec za najboljšo pesem. Pred tem je zaigrala v TV seriji Ameriška grozljivka, na filmu pa je debutirala v trilerju Mačeta ubijaRoberta Rodrigueza.
Scottov zadnji film je bila drama Ves denar sveta o ugrabitvi vnuka ameriškega naftnega mogotca Jeana Paula Gettyja. V njej sta zaigrala Michelle Williams in Mark Wahlberg. Njegov naslednji projekt pa bo triler The Last Duel z Mattom Damonom, Benom Affleckom in Jodie Comer v glavnih vlogah.
text:
Lady Gaga in Ridley Scott's drama about the murder of Maurizio Gucci
03 Nov 2019, 11:21 by STA

Singer Lady Gaga has been given a new film role after she appeared in the Oscar-nominated Star for Born. She will star in Ridley Scott's drama about the murder of Maurizio Gucci from a famous Italian fashion family. She will take on the role of his ex-wife, Patrizia Reggiani, who accused her of ordering the murder.



Lady Gaga will play the role of ex-wife of Maurizio Gucci Patrizia Reggiani in Scott's movie. Photo: Profimedia

LOS ANGELES> Maurice Gucci shot a mercenary in front of his office in 1995 when he was head of the family fashion house. Two years later, Patrizio Reggiani was arrested and sentenced to 29 years in prison a year later for her role in his murder.
The media who watched the trial closely identified her as a black widow. Her daughters, however, argued that her behavior was influenced by a brain tumor, hoping that the verdict would be set aside. She was last released in 2016 for appropriate behavior, reports the British Guardian.
Scott will film the story with the help of wife Giannina Scott, who is best known for her role as Russell Crowe's wife in Gladiator, and has produced several films. Based on Sarah Gay Forden's book The House of Gucci: A Sensational Story of Murder, Madness, Glamor, and Greed, the screenplay will be written by director Roberto Bentivegna, who will turn into a screenwriter for the first time.
Lady Gaga starred in the birth of Bradley Cooper, who also starred in the Oscar, received an Academy Award nomination for Best Actress and won a statue for Best Song. She has previously starred in the TV series American Horror, and made her debut in the thriller Machete Kills by Robert Rodriguez.
Scott's latest film was the drama All Money in the World about the abduction of American oil mogul Jean Paul Getty's grandson. It starred Michelle Williams and Mark Wahlberg. His next project, however, will be the thriller The Last Duel with Matt Damon, Ben Affleck and Jodie Comer in the lead roles.
